products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Roller Blind
products.description: Roma thunderbird is not a shade to be missed - as in, it simply can't be. Bold and memorable, this blind is almost opaque, yet doesn't block out the light entirely, making for a great compromise. Don't be shy; use the thunderbird as a central feature in your white or cream kitchen, or go bold in the bathroom by opting for a non-traditional colour scheme of red and white. Or you might find that this daring red provides you with all the motivation you need in your home office.

products.title: Thunderstorm Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The grey thnderstorm aluminium venetian blind is a lovely, darker grey tone - ideal for pairing with darker colour in the rest of your room, or for being the darker focal point of your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Roma, Thunderbird - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma in thunderbird is the ideal filter blind for keeping just the right amount of light in your room when you need a little privacy or shade. Combine with that the dark, red hue and you have style and usability all in one. This strong, striking blind is here to make a statement, and a statement it will make. Help it along by placing against white or cream walls in your kitchen or dining room to really make it pop.

products.title: Lux Thunder Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Lux Dark Thunder Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms and living rooms where you need to block all of the light - like when trying to sleep or when there is glare on your tv.

products.title: Thunder Grey & Stone - 50mm Slat
products.description: This thunder grey & stone brings softness, beauty and contemporary flair to your home in an instant, thanks to the smooth, light slats and contrasting warm tapes. This combination of cool and cosy shades, plus the contrast of hard wood slats and soft fabric tapes makes this this thunder grey & stone brings softness, beauty and contemporary flair to your home in an instant, thanks to the smooth, light slats and contrasting warm tapes.

products.title: Prism, Thunder - Roller Blind
products.description: Prism thunder combines a cheery and welcoming style of printing with a slightly colder and more distant colour scheme. The end result is a design that welcomes you through the door before slowing things down and taking the edge off. The light blues make this the perfect addition to the master bedroom so that you can switch off and begin to wind down. It's all about adding in other slightly faded colours like greens and browns.

products.title: Neo, Thunder - Roller Blind
products.description: The neo thunder is a grey-blue, ornately patterned filter blind that is sure to add something a little different to your home. The high quality fabric hangs on an easy-to-use rolling mechanism, so using this blind is as simple you would want it to be. Unite the thunder with creams, greys, and muted blues in an older child's bedroom or playroom for a subtle and fun style; or use in the guest bedroom to give your visitors a warm and eye-catching welcome.

products.title: Real Wood Thunderstorm Perfect Fit
products.description: Pair this timeless grey perfect fit with a monochrome decor, or use to balance a colourful space. Stylish until the last, this slat has a matt painted finish, with the real woodgrain gently visible through the stain. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.
